document_data.name: Moss Skull
document_data.level2e: {{spell table|edition=2e|[[Cleric]]|5|[[Combat sphere|Combat]]|5|[[Elemental sphere|Elemental]]|5|[[Elemental fire sphere|Elemental Fire]]|5}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moss skull''''' was a [[divine]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] that conjured a skull-shaped projectile.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, the spell manifested an explosive, moss-covered skull that streaked towards a target person or creature. When it struck, the ''moss skull'' detonated in a blast of ice and fire.

The projectile could be detonated mid-flight, willed away by the caster or outright destroyed, if it was struck by fire or ice.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell were inscribed within the [[relic]] known as the ''[[Leaves of Green]]''.
document_data.Components: In order to be cast, this spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, along with a number of [[material component]]s: a shard of [[human]] bone, a pinch of ash from organic material, and an additional piece of bone taken from a dead, [[Frostbite (condition)|frostbitten]] creature.
